0: Though lobby area can be improved further overall never disappoint me whenever I stay at this hotel

The reception and Grand is fix now a little confusing
Facility room and staff communication is not good enough to be a five star hotel

1: Good service and friendly staff from door service to check in at the reception business centre and room service

Centrally located with amenities on site
